meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michelle Flaherty Marlon Morris Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6829.

td.p: Michelle Flaherty, a shelter advocate and caregiver from Natrona Heights, Pennsylvania
Marlon Morris, a sales representative from Maywood, Illinois
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 8-day cash winnings total $170,610)

tr.td: PLAYING AT THE CASINO
MULTIPLE MEANINGS
LAW ENFORCEMENT TV
SCRAMBLED MAMMALS
THAT'S "SUPER"!
(Alex: And all of the clues in that category will be given by Melissa Clark from The New York Times.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Some say to split 2 8s you\'re dealt in this game, as 16 isn\'t so good, but don\'t split 10s!')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Some say to split 2 8s you're dealt in this game, as 16 isn't so good, but don't split 10s!

Marlon

ON THE "Q...T"
